name: The Happy Neighborhood
description:
Welcome to the happy neighborhood, where the residence are all kind of weird creatures, like ghosts, monsters, and even an evil witch! You have to compete  with other players in the role of an architect and build the perfect house for each character, but hurry up! cause if you don't, the evil witch will capture the poor creatures and haunt their souls  forever! 

Can you beat time and other players and become the best architect in town? lets see..
